title: Mason

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Induct a player into your sanctuary during the day.
- Control the actions of an inducted player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have a night chat with your inducted players.
- You may not hear or send whispers, or receive messages which are any direct form of communication that comes from another role.
- Your target will still receive their notifications when you control them. You do not receive any notifications from players you control.
- You ignore control and redirect immunity, and can control players through any ability-stopping or jailing abilities.
- You can force your target to target more than one person with your control, however they will do nothing to their second target if their abilities don't normally allow them to multitarget.
- You can force your target to target dead players, however it will do nothing if their abilities don't already interact with dead players.
- You may force your target to target themselves.
